articles.title: Coronavirus warning: Doctors reveal key information about signs in the first three days - Express
articles.description: CORONAVIRUS is still very much present in the UK after new government figures revealed the UK's coronavirus death toll has passed more than 40,000. Now, doctors have revealed key information about the early symptoms of COVID-19.
